reasoning: Team A upgrades significantly at QB to an elite, week-winning option in Jalen Hurts by trading from its deepest position group. With Brock Bowers still on the roster, parting with George Kittle is a manageable cost. Team B fixes its biggest roster weakness, upgrading from a low-end TE1 in Tucker Kraft to a top-tier TE in Kittle, while still receiving a reliable starting QB in Justin Herbert to replace Hurts. This trade addresses the primary needs of both teams.
